帳面: (ちょうめん) - note book; account book
帷子: (かたびら) - light, thin, single-layer kimono (esp. from hemp or raw silk, for summer use); shroud/burial clothes
帷幄の臣: (いあくのしん) - close adviser; close advisor
帷幄上奏: (いあくじょうそう) - direct appeal to the throne by the military
帷幕: (いばく) - curtain; field staff headquarters; secret meeting place
常とう句: (じょうとうく) - cliche; frequently used musical (guitar) phrase
常とう手段: (じょうとうしゅだん) - (yoji) one's habitual practice; usual measure; old trick
常世: (とこよ) - eternalness/forever unchanging; distant land over the sea/world of the dead
常世の国: (とこよのくに) - distant country; heaven; hades
常人: (じょうじん) - ordinary person; run-of-the-mill people; John Doe; Jane Doe
常人逮捕: (じょうじんたいほ) - citizen's arrest
常任委員: (じょうにんいいん) - member of a standing committee
常任委員会: (じょうにんいいんかい) - standing committee
常任指揮者: (じょうにんしきしゃ) - regular (permanent) conductor
常任理事国: (じょうにんりじこく) - standing member-nation of the UN Security Council
常会: (じょうかい) - regular meeting; ordinary Diet session
常住: (じょうじゅう) - always/constantly/eternally; (orig. meaning) (ant: 無常) constancy/eternity; permanent residence
常住不断: (じょうじゅうふだん) - (yoji) ceaseless; constant; uninterrupted
常住不滅: (じょうじゅうふめつ) - (yoji) everlasting; forever unchanging; undying
常住坐臥: (じょうじゅうざが) - (yoji) at all times; day in, day out; constantly; always
常例: (じょうれい) - usual practice; custom; common usage
常備: (じょうび) - standing; reserve; always having ready
常動曲: (じょうどうきょく) - {music} moto perpetuo; perpetuum mobile; perpetual motion
常務: (じょうむ) - managing director/executive director; routine business/regular business
常務取締役: (じょうむとりしまりやく) - managing director
常在: (じょうざい) - resident; indigenous; always existing
常在戦場: (じょうざいせんじょう) - (yoji) always conducting oneself as though one were on a battlefield; being combat ready at all times (of a person)
常夏の国: (とこなつのくに) - land of everlasting summer
常夏月: (とこなつづき) - sixth lunar month
常夜: (じょうや) - perpetual night; (じょうや only) continuing all night
常夜鍋: (とこやなべ) - shabu-shabu-like hotpot dish with pork, spinach, etc.
常套句: (じょうとうく) - cliche; frequently used musical (guitar) phrase
常套手段: (じょうとうしゅだん) - (yoji) one's habitual practice; usual measure; old trick
常套表現: (じょうとうひょうげん) - (yoji) conventional (stock) phrase; hackneyed expression; platitude; cliche
常客: (じょうきゃく) - regular customer; patron
常宿: (じょうやど) - one's regular inn or hotel
常寂光土: (じょうじゃっこうど) - land of eternally tranquil light (highest realm in Tendai Buddhism)
常寧殿: (そうねいでん) - ladies' pavilion (of the inner Heian Palace)
常座: (じょうざ) - upstage right (on a noh stage)
常得意: (じょうとくい) - regular customer; patron
常御所: (つねのごしょ) - room or pavilion of residence for the master of the house (Heian period palatial-style architecture); room where the emperor usually lives in the imperial palace
常態化: (じょうたいか) - normalization (of a social problem, of a situation, etc.)
常時: (じょうじ) - usually/ordinarily; continuous/24-hour (e.g. observation, operation (of a machine), care (of patient))/always on
常時接続: (じょうじせつぞく) - always-on connection
常染色体: (じょうせんしょくたい) - autosome (non-sex chromosome)
常法: (じょうほう) - fixed rule; usual way/usual method
常温: (じょうおん) - normal temperature; average temperature; fixed temperature
常温核融合: (じょうおんかくゆうごう) - cold fusion
常灯: (じょうとう) - continuously burning light (e.g. at a Buddhist altar); roadside lamp that stays lit all night
常灯明: (じょうとうみょう) - continuously burning light (e.g. at a Buddhist altar)
常燈明: (じょうとうみょう) - continuously burning light (e.g. at a Buddhist altar)
常用: (じょうよう) - habitual use; daily use
常用外: (じょうようがい) - (kanji) not in the Jouyou set
常用対数: (じょうようたいすう) - logarithm (base 10); common logarithm
常用手段: (じょうようしゅだん) - (yoji) one's usual practice; one's old trick; one's usual modus operandi; the same old tactic
常用漢字: (じょうようかんじ) - kanji for common use (list of 2,136 kanji established in 2010, formerly a list of 1,945 established in 1981)
常用者: (じょうようしゃ) - constant user; addict
常用薄明: (じょうようはくめい) - {astron} civil twilight
常盤桜: (ときわざくら) - round leaved primula (Primula obconica); primrose; poison primrose
